structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Public hearings for determination of whether district shall function.
law.text: The fiscal court of any county desiring to place its air pollution control district in operation and the legislative body of the largest city in such county must hold separate public hearings prior to and for the purpose of determining whether or not there is need for an air pollution control district to function.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 62, effective January 1, 2015. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 5, effective March 14, 1952.
